commands.name: az iot ops secretsync disable
commands.summary: Disable secret sync for an instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops secretsync disable --instance
                              --resource-group
                              [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot ops secretsync disable --instance myinstance -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops secretsync enable
commands.summary: Enable secret sync for an instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops secretsync enable --instance
                             --kv-resource-id
                             --mi-user-assigned
                             --resource-group
                             [--self-hosted-issuer {false, true}]
                             [--skip-ra {false, true}]
                             [--spc]
examples: az iot ops secretsync enable --instance myinstance -g myresourcegroup --mi-user-assigned $UA_MI_RESOURCE_ID --kv-resource-id $KEYVAULT_RESOURCE_ID
az iot ops secretsync enable --instance myinstance -g myresourcegroup --mi-user-assigned $UA_MI_RESOURCE_ID --kv-resource-id $KEYVAULT_RESOURCE_ID --skip-ra

commands.name: az iot ops secretsync list
commands.summary: List the secret sync configs associated with an instance.
examples: az iot ops secretsync list --instance myinstance -g myresourcegroup
